summary: THERE HAS NOT BEEN A RECALL ON THE PAINT ON 1998 DODGE RAM 1500.  THERE ARE A LOT OF THEM THAT ARE HAVE PROBLEMS WITH THE PAINT, MINE INCLUDED.  THE RECALL IS ONLY FOR 97 RED DODGES.  IS THERE ANYTHING THAT CAN BE DONE ABOUT THIS.  I DON'T WANT TO HAVE TO PAY FOR A NEW PAINT JOB WHEN THERE ARE OTHER RECALLS FOR THE TRUCK.  *NLM
